title: Outlast 2 (2017)
description:
Year : April 25. 2017
Genre : Survival-Horror ,  Action
Publication Type : RePack
Language : RUS | ENG | Multi9
Voice set Language : ENG
Tablet : Enclosing (CODEX)

System Requirements: 
Operating system : the Windows Vista / 7/8/10, 64-BITS
Processor : the Intel Core i3-530
Memory : 4 GB
Video : 1 GB VRAM, NVIDIA Geforce GTX 260 / ATI Radeon HD 4870
Sound card : Sound device compatible with 9.0 DirectX ®
Free space on hard drive : 25 GB

Game features:
The game was created on a modified and improved game engine Unreal Engine 3.5 +
High quality graphics provide detailed horrific world offer players to explore.
Atmospheric and high-quality sound design, music, sounds and noises will not let you relax.
Survival. If you want to survive, you have only one choice: to flee or hide. Gameplay includes elements stealth action.
World second part of the game has become much more. The game will be developed in several locations.
Time or place of the next occurrence of the horrific inhabitants is impossible to predict. Events will occur randomly.
First-person view, expand the sinister secrets, use the term Detective.
The need to use technical devices to see what is happening in the dark. Turn the lens with the lens cameras, equipped with a night vision mode and you will see something that just can not be overlooked.

Features repack:
Do not cut | Do not recoded
Game archives are not touched
Changing the language settings in the game 
Installation time 15 minutes on HDD (depending on your computer)

Installation:
1.Mount and install
2.Play
